channel.title: PC LOAD LETTER: Two Guys, One Mic
channel.description: Ben Collins and and Brian Fitzpatrick answer your questions about open source software development, collaborative software development tools, and the problems that inevitably arise when you try to write software with other people.
channel.itunes:author: Ben Collins-Sussman and Brian Fitzpatrick
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ben and Fitz answer your questions about open source software development
channel.itunes:summary: Ben Collins and and Brian Fitzpatrick answer your questions about open source software development, collaborative software development tools, and the problems that inevitably arise when you try to write software with other people.

item.title: PC LOAD LETTER Episode 1: The Early Days
item.description: Who we are, annoying airplane people, how we got started in Subversion, and the beginnings of the Subversion project
item.itunes:author: Ben Collins-Sussman and Brian Fitzpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Who we are, annoying airplane people, how we got started in Subversion, and the beginnings of the Subversion project
item.itunes:summary: Who we are, annoying airplane people, how we got started in Subversion, and the beginnings of the Subversion project
item.itunes:keywords: technology, open source, free software, poisonous people, conflict
